revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMCD3GN |revision=V3 |asin= |fcc_date=11/26/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Hitron |manuf_model=CGN |manuf_rev=V |availability= |type=wireless router,cable modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=JI5-D3GNV3 |ic_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=C7P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=60 |cpu1_brand=Intel Puma |cpu1_model=DNCE2500GU;Puma 5; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model= |fla1_num=2 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU6416GG-AC |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (oversized), USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMP-N14 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3883 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=HOME-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^HOME-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=10.0.0.1 |default_user=cusadmin |default_pass=highspeed |oui= |oui_eth= }} Per the FCC photos... *"P/N: 363300045452 REV 04" (this is almost certainly mostly wrong) :appears to be silkscreened on the main board. *"PN:382208100202-10" is silkscreened on the RT3883 module: :WiSoC: [[Ralink]] RT3883 @500 MHz 3T3R (iNIC) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM639165TS-6G (16MB) *The '''Intel''' SoC is marked with.. :i(M)(C)07 :W222TH52 :SLHCV (E1) :SNCE2500GU {{See also|Intel Puma|Hitron CGNV}}
The Coaxial portion is using a '''MxL''' ('''MaxLinear''') MXL261. :The device may use a B8:9B:C9 ('''SMC Networks''') OUI. The default credentials in this entry are from the FCC manual :and may not be fully accurate.
